meanings.sent1: The cake was bonzer, with delicious frosting and moist layers.
meanings.sent2: She received a bonzer gift for her birthday, a beautiful necklace.
meanings.sent3: The bonzer sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: His bonzer skills on the guitar left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The bonzer fireworks display lit up the night sky with brilliance.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is excellent or outstanding.
meanings.sent1: The new student turned out to be a real bonzer in math class.
meanings.sent2: The vintage car was a real bonzer, attracting attention wherever it went.
meanings.sent3: The bonzer of the group, she always came up with the best ideas.
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the park was a bonzer, standing tall and majestic.
meanings.sent5: The detective was known as a bonzer in solving difficult cases.
